author: Toby Codd
title: Met Office predicts Easter washout as South West braced for heavy downpours - Devon Live
text: Forecasters are expecting a potential Easter washout with heavy rain set to batter parts of the nation. The Met Office says that the weather will be "unsettled" and "changeable" throughout the Easter weekend while weather maps show heavy downpours hitting Devon and Cornwall next week. According to the Exeter-based forecaster, the start of April could be overwhelmingly wet. It comes after the nation has seen nearly 10 inches of rain so far in March. As reported by the Express , the latest weather data show that 251mm (9.8 inches) of rain has fallen across the nation this month. However, the worst could be yet to come as the whole of the UK braces for downpours this Easter - with more rain to fall beforehand. Read next Flybe is finally wound up leaving £700m in unpaid debts Man involved with Downton Abbey died in Devon cliff fall Issuing a forecast for this weekend for the South West, the Met Office said there will be some blustery showers this evening and overnight, which could turn heavy at times carrying the risk of hail and thunder. Saturday will be a mixture of sunny spells and scattered, blustery showers, but again, these could turn heavy at times carrying the risk of hail. And the Met Office's long-range forecast says that rainfall will be extensive from March 25 to April 3. Weather maps also show that Devon and parts of the West Country are set for heavy downpours next week and throughout the weekend. The forecast states: "Through the bank holiday weekend and into the following week, unsettled or changeable weather remains the most likely outcome. All areas are likely to see further rain or showers at times, with some drier spells in between, but wet weather will tend to favour the southwest while northern parts remain a bit drier on average." The most severe rain is expected to hit the South West coast next week, with up to 34mm forecasted to fall on Tuesday (March 26). Maps from WXCharts also show no part of the country left untouched by rainfall next Saturday (March 30). Met Office 5-day forecast for the South West Today: A damp start though rain gradually clearing through the morning allowing some bright or sunny spells to develop, and the odd shower possible. Breezy through the afternoon and feeling colder. Maximum temperature 12 °C. Tonight: Blustery showers continuing this evening and overnight, these turning heavy at times carrying the risk of hail and thunder. Windy and colder than recent nights. Minimum temperature 3 °C. Saturday: A mixture of sunny spells and scattered, blustery showers, these could turn heavy at times carrying the risk of hail. Feeling rather cold, especially in the stronger winds. Maximum temperature 11 °C. Outlook for Sunday to Tuesday: Any showers gradually fading through Sunday with some sunny spells. Becoming unsettled again on Monday with outbreaks of rain, followed by showers or longer spells of rain on Tuesday.

author: Christian
title: Harnessing the Power of Hormones: Exploring the Benefits of DHEA Supplements
text:
Table of Contents
Toggle
Understanding the Role of DHEA in the Body: Exploring the Potential Benefits of DHEA Supplements: Navigating the Safety and Risks of DHEA Supplementation: Understanding Individualized Treatment Approaches: Incorporating Lifestyle Factors for Hormonal Balance: Exploring Natural Remedies and Alternative Therapies: Understanding the Benefits of Naturally Made DHEA Supplements:
DHEA, or dehydroepiandrosterone, is a hormone produced by the adrenal glands that plays a crucial role in hormone production and metabolism. As we age, DHEA levels naturally decline, leading to a variety of age-related symptoms such as fatigue, decreased libido, and cognitive decline. DHEA supplements offer a natural and effective way to replenish declining hormone levels, promoting vitality, energy, and overall well-being. In this article, we’ll explore the benefits of DHEA supplements, their potential impact on health and vitality, and how they can help individuals harness the power of hormones for optimal wellness.
Understanding the Role of DHEA in the Body: DHEA is a precursor hormone that is converted into other hormones, including testosterone and estrogen, in the body. It plays a crucial role in hormone production, metabolism, and immune function, influencing everything from energy levels and mood regulation to libido and cognitive function. DHEA levels peak in early adulthood and gradually decline with age, leading to a range of age-related symptoms and health issues. By supplementing with DHEA, individuals can support healthy hormone levels and promote overall well-being as they age.
Exploring the Potential Benefits of DHEA Supplements: DHEA supplements offer a wide range of potential benefits for both men and women. Studies have suggested that DHEA supplementation may improve energy levels, enhance mood, support cognitive function, and boost libido in individuals with low DHEA levels. Additionally, DHEA has been studied for its potential anti-aging effects, with some research suggesting that it may help reduce the risk of age-related diseases such as heart disease, osteoporosis, and cognitive decline. While more research is needed to fully understand the long-term effects of DHEA supplementation, many individuals report positive results from incorporating DHEA supplements into their wellness routine.
DHEA supplements offer a natural and effective way to support hormonal balance, promote vitality, and enhance overall well-being. By understanding the role of DHEA in the body, especially dhea for women , exploring the potential benefits and risks of supplementation, and adopting a personalized treatment approach, individuals can harness the power of hormones for optimal health and vitality. Whether you’re looking to boost energy levels, enhance mood, or support cognitive function, DHEA supplements offer a safe and effective solution for promoting holistic wellness at every stage of life.
Navigating the Safety and Risks of DHEA Supplementation: While DHEA supplements offer promising benefits for hormonal balance and overall well-being, it’s essential to consider the potential risks and safety concerns associated with supplementation. DHEA supplements may interact with certain medications and medical conditions, including hormone-sensitive cancers, diabetes, and psychiatric disorders. Additionally, long-term use of DHEA supplements may increase the risk of side effects such as acne, hair loss, and mood changes. Before starting DHEA supplementation, it’s crucial to consult with a healthcare provider to assess your individual needs and determine the appropriate dosage and duration of treatment.
Understanding Individualized Treatment Approaches: Every individual’s hormone levels and health needs are unique, and the most effective treatment approach will vary depending on factors such as age, gender, health status, and lifestyle. When incorporating DHEA supplements into your wellness routine, it’s essential to work closely with a healthcare provider to develop a personalized treatment plan that addresses your specific needs and concerns. Your healthcare provider can help you determine the appropriate dosage, monitor your hormone levels, and adjust your treatment as needed to ensure optimal results and safety.
Incorporating Lifestyle Factors for Hormonal Balance: In addition to DHEA supplementation, lifestyle factors play a crucial role in maintaining hormonal balance and supporting overall well-being. Eating a balanced diet rich in fruits, vegetables, whole grains, and lean proteins can provide essential nutrients that support hormone production and metabolism. Regular exercise, stress management techniques, adequate sleep, and mindfulness practices can also help regulate hormone levels and reduce the severity of age-related symptoms. By adopting a holistic approach to hormone balance, individuals can optimize their health and vitality at every stage of life.
Exploring Natural Remedies and Alternative Therapies: In addition to DHEA supplementation, many individuals turn to natural remedies and alternative therapies to support hormonal balance and enhance overall well-being. Herbal supplements such as maca root, ashwagandha, and rhodiola are valued for their adaptogenic properties, which help the body adapt to stress and promote hormonal balance. Acupuncture, massage therapy, chiropractic care, and aromatherapy are also valued for their ability to reduce stress, improve mood, and support hormone regulation. Incorporating these natural remedies and therapies into your wellness routine can complement DHEA supplementation and promote optimal health and vitality.
Understanding the Benefits of Naturally Made DHEA Supplements: Bywinona.com offers a range of naturally made DHEA supplements designed to support hormonal balance and promote overall well-being. Their products are formulated with high-quality ingredients and backed by scientific research to deliver safe and effective results. Whether you’re looking to boost energy levels, enhance mood, or support cognitive function, bywinona.com has the solutions you need to harness the power of hormones and optimize your health naturally. Discover the transformative benefits of their DHEA supplements today and unlock the secret to vitality and well-being at bywinona.com.

author: Arkema
title: ARKEMA OBTAINS MASS BALANCE ISCC PLUS CERTIFICATION FOR ADVANCED LIQUID RESINS PRODUCTION FACILITY IN PASIR GUDANG (MALAYSIA)
text:
PASIR GUDANG, Malaysia , Feb. 27, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Arkema, a leader in specialty materials, has expanded its bio-attributed offer with ISCC PLUS certification of its acrylic and liquid polyester resins (OFPE) production site in Pasir Gudang, Malaysia . This certification is part of the company's global Mass Balance * offer roadmap. It will support its customers across many industries in the region with more sustainable solutions for fast growing application areas including coatings, adhesives for new energies, green mobility, living comfort, infrastructure efficiency and more.
" This certification expands the availability of Arkema advanced liquid resins solutions from renewable origin with a lower product carbon footprint. It offers a new range of bio-attributed materials, reinforcing the already existing bio-based resins and additives offer containing up to 100% biobased content, " said Yoon Hock CHONG - Managing Director ACRM Coating Solutions Southeast Asia.
The ISCC PLUS certification of products made at the Arkema manufacturing site in Pasir Gudang follows certifications in the US, in Europe and in China . Arkema's strategy is to progressively introduce a complete range of bio-attributed specialty resins and additives, including high solids, waterborne, UV/LED/EB , and polyester powders.
To learn more about mass balance and other ISCC PLUS certifications announcements from Arkema Coating Solutions: Changshu (China) , Nansha (China) , Villers-Saint-Paul ( France ) , Clear Lake (US ), Sant Celoni ( Spain ), Taixing (China) , Carling ( France ) .
* Mass balance provides manufacturers with a methodology to track the certified materials as they move along the value chain and attribute the inputs of a production process, to outputs of that production process through certified bookkeeping. This distinct accounting method verifies that the certified feedstock has replaced an equivalent quantity of fossil raw materials at the beginning of the supply chain and can be attributed to the product-to-be-sold, ensuring that both input and output are balanced. [source ISCC]
A bio-attributed content indicates that the use of a biobased feedstock has been ascribed using a mass-balance methodology. The bio-attributed content is the % breakdown based on the ISCC+ methodology calculation. It is a clear distinction to materials in which the biobased content can be verified using the radiocarbon method. [Source Arkema]
Building on its unique set of expertise in materials science, Arkema offers a portfolio of first-class technologies to address evergrowing demand for new and sustainable materials. With the ambition to become in 2024 a pure player in Specialty Materials, the Group is structured into 3 complementary, resilient, and highly innovative segments dedicated to Specialty Materials – Adhesive Solutions, Advanced Materials, and Coating Solutions - accounting for some 92% of Group sales in 2023, and a well-positioned and competitive Intermediates segment. Arkema offers cutting-edge technological solutions to meet the challenges of, among other things, new energies, access to water, recycling, urbanization, and mobility, and fosters a permanent dialogue with all its stakeholders. The Group reported sales of around € 9.5 billion in 2023 and operates in some 55 countries with 21,100 employees worldwide.

author: @TUTTOJUVE_COM
title: E. League: 3-1 alla Real Sociedad, Lazio agli ottavi
text:
E. League: 3-1 alla Real Sociedad, Lazio agli ottavi
di
Twitter:
Fonte: ANSA
TuttoJuve.com
© foto di www.imagephotoagency.it
(ANSA) - ROMA, 23 GEN - All'Olimpico arriva una vittoria netta, 3-1, per la Lazio contro la Real Sociedad, ed è un risultato che assicura alla squadra di Marco Barobi il passaggio agli ottavi di finale dell'Europa League. Il match della settimana prossima l'Olimpico e passa agli ottavi di finale con un turno di anticipo. La sfida della prossima settimana sul campo del Braga servirà soltanto a determinare se i biancocelesti saranno primi (basterà un pareggio) o secondi nella fase 'a campionato'.
Le reti della partita di oggi sono state segnate tutte nel primo tempo da Mario Gila, Zaccagni e Castellanos. Di Barrentxea al 37' st il gol dei baschi, rimasti in dieci dal 30' pt per l'espulsione di Munoz (doppio 'giallo'). (ANSA).
